methods.description: Send an SMS with verification code and a custom message for authentication purpose.

parameters.name: countryCode
parameters.description: ISO 3166 country code for the recipient mobile phone number. If parameter is supplied, then some basic telephone number validation is done.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Returns the API response in json (default) or xml format.

parameters.name: tel
parameters.description: The recipient mobile phone number in E164 format which is a plus followed by just numbers with no spaces or parentheses.

parameters.name: mesg
parameters.description: The message template for the SMS. Add <otp> as placeholder for the actual OTP to be generated. Max length is 140 characters.

apiDescription: Send an SMS with verification code and a custom message for authentication purpose. It helps merchants to minimize chargebacks and fraud for various kinds of payment method, such as credit card, paypal, cod and so on. Please visit https://www.fraudlabspro.com to learn more.
